title: Marauder and Warden Skins
body:
Hey,
Just wondering when those skins are meant to be released, thinking about heading to the shops today and pick some RP up to buy them. Any help would be superb. They look so good...

replies.body: well you can get them with a battle boost in Nemesis so soon
you can already get warden sivir in nemesis mode had one on my team on sunday
Probably when (my own opinion) Nemesis draft has been taken down, they'll do the patch then, i think
No details whatsoever from Riot. My best guess is that they'll come out tomorrow, or on the 25th when the Valentine's Day and Lunar Revel Sales end.

They will be released this patch. Most patches last 2-3 weeks before a new patch is released, so if your lucky, by the end of the month.

Otherwise early next month.
